creator: 0x928962d689a633dbd62ee0f1555b4074b4d32bec
name: Crypto Gold Rush DAO
description:
Crypto Gold Rush is a documentary capturing the shift from before crypto to the new evolving world following innovation, people and companies as crypto is adopted within art, finance, entertainment, government and technology in general with the introduction of the Blockchain, NFT's, contracts and the MetaVerse. 
Crypto Gold Rush is built and funded in crypto as a DAO creating the CGOLDR token so the Crypto Gold Rush community can get involved with Governance, NFT’s and sharing in the business. As a community we will vote on what platform the feature documentary will be release on, web3 only or Amazon/Netflix - this will be the decision of the community (Crypto Gold Rush CREW!). NFT’s will be unlocked during production to all CGOLDR token holders. The NFT’s will represent your CREDIT in the documentary from Executive Producers and Associate Producers for major investors to a full breakdown for the Production Department (“Crew”).
payDisclosure: You are buying CGOLDR tokens to support and become Crew! on the Crypto Gold Rush documentary production.
